headline: Baxter to Present at Raymond James & Associates’ 46th Annual Institutional Investors Conference
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., February 17, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a global medtech leader, will present at the Raymond James & Associates’ 46th Annual Institutional Investors Conference on Monday, March 3, 2025. Joel Grade, Baxter’s chief financial officer, is scheduled to present at 1:05 p.m. Eastern Time.
